title: Add sandbox_path and branch_name to vc_mission_state table
description:
Add sandbox_path and branch_name columns to the vc_mission_state extension table to track sandbox metadata per mission.

CURRENT:
- vc_mission_state table exists but doesn't store sandbox info
- Sandbox metadata is only in Manager's in-memory map

NEEDED:
- ALTER TABLE vc_mission_state ADD COLUMN sandbox_path TEXT
- ALTER TABLE vc_mission_state ADD COLUMN branch_name TEXT
- Migration to add columns if not exists
- Update SetMissionState/GetMissionState to read/write these fields

This enables persistent tracking of which sandbox belongs to which mission, so workers can find and reuse the shared sandbox.
acceptance_criteria:
- vc_mission_state has sandbox_path column
- vc_mission_state has branch_name column
- Migration code adds columns safely (IF NOT EXISTS)
- SetMissionState persists sandbox_path and branch_name
- GetMissionState returns sandbox metadata
- Tests verify persistence across executor restarts
